name: Dark Chronicles: The Soul Reaver
description:
Play a thrilling hidden object adventure, free the tortured souls and find out what mysteries a peaceful village is hiding.

Something terrible is happening in a distant French village. You’ve received an urgent message from your dear friend Philip - his sister died recently under mysterious circumstances, and now Philip is being haunted by horrifying and recurring nightmares. Some time ago, an evil witch was killed by the local townspeople, and her mansion was burned down. But could she have indeed returned from death itself? back. You must hurry to Philip, and find out what mysteries his peaceful village is hiding... and whether an evil presence still hides in the shadows.

- Discover what secrets hide in the dark mansion.
- Lots of mini games and ho scenes!
- Prepare the secret ritual and beat the evil presence.
- Free the tortured souls.
